description: Wonderful example of a repertory theatre in style of European opera houses, with vast stage, sub-stage workshops and auditorium seating 785.

factsheet.heading: Churchill Theatre Tour
paragraphs: The Churchill Theatre is offering the opportunity to have a short (approx. 30 minutes) tour of the building. We are a function venue and will be hosting a new production of Frankenstein throughout the week, so this tour will give you the chance to see the venue in action preparing for the day's performances later on.
Please bare in mind that this is a walking tour and there will be plenty of stairs to go up and down.

name: Churchill Theatre
